item.description:
Incoming! War has been proclaimed and the threat of a nuclear attack is immanent. A group of highly specialized soldiers will be given the difficult task of finding the nuclear bomb and disarming it. Grab your gear and get ready for a dangerous op… your lives depend on success! Get your NERF blasters ready for a two hour battle event for ages 6 and up.

Call us at 781-270-4800 to pre-register; $15/member, $20/nonmember. Blaster lease available.
item.name: Nerf Buddy Night: Call to Action â€“ Modern War
